nodes.text: Sabodor's was a purveyor of exotic pets. It was located on Etti IV.
Han Solo and Chewbacca's bulk freighter, the Eravana, included a container that hosted a veterinary droid which tended to exotic pets acquired at Sabodor's.

Sabodor's was created in the Legends novel Han Solo at Stars' End, written by Brian Daley. Its existence and presence on Etti IV was introduced to the current canon in Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Incredible Cross-Sections, published in 2015.
